price: Nanso εberε a ͻde Yεn nsεnkyerεnee no brεε wͻn no, hwε! wͻseree (Yεn nsεnkyeεnee no).
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā jāahum biāyātinā idhā hum min'hā yaḍḥakūna
